forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West wind around 16 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind 13 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

weather_report:
As the dusk settles over Downtown San Francisco, the city breathes a sigh of relief from the day's commotion. Overnight conditions are mostly clear, offering an inviting crispness around 52 degrees, complemented by a gentle westerly breeze that carries the soft whispers of the bay. The night’s tranquility is a precursor to a beautiful Thursday. As dawn unfolds with a brilliant sun, expect the warmth to rise to a high near 64, although a delicate shift toward the afternoon coolness will keep the atmosphere refreshingly pleasant.

The promise of sunshine dances with the assurance of a light chill, making it a day to appreciate on foot. The clarity of the skies invites exploration; while fog may linger in the corners of the bay, it acts as a mere backdrop to the vibrant hues of the cityscape. Dressing in layers will be wise today—perhaps a light sweater to transition comfortably from the cool morning embrace into the warmth of the afternoon sun. Consider a leisurely visit to a local café for a warm coffee followed by a stroll along Embarcadero, relishing in the gentle hustle of the day while the city awakens around you. The weather beckons to experience the simple joys of life punctuated by the beauty of San Francisco’s iconic skyline.
